name: Blue Light Lens
description: These lenses use a special protective shield that helps filter out blue light from screens. They also reduce glare and offer greater visual comfort.

name: Sunglasses
description: Choose from dark, gradient, or polarised tints, all with 100% UVA/B protection.

name: Transition Light Intelligent Lenses
description: Transitions Light Intelligent Lenses adapt to changing light conditions, going from clear indoors to dark outdoors. They block 100% of UV rays and help protect against harmful blue light. Select from a range of Transitions lenses.
